Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea10JSON.name: JSONObject
Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea10JSON.abstract: Simple type alias for [String: Any], which is the closest Swift type to JSONSerialization‘s representation of a JSON object.

Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea9JSONA.name: JSONArray
Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea9JSONA.abstract: Simple type alias for [Any], which is what JSONSerialization returns when decoding a JSON array.

Structs/ValidJSONObject.html#/s:5Medea15.name: associate(key:value:)
Structs/ValidJSONObject.html#/s:5Medea15.abstract: Sets (i.e. associates) value with a given key. Blows up if value is not valid JSON.

Structs/ValidJSONObject.html#/s:5Medea15.name: associateIfValid(key:value:)
Structs/ValidJSONObject.html#/s:5Medea15.abstract: Sets (i.e. associates) value for a given key, but only if value is valid JSON.

Enums/FileError.html#/s:5Medea9FileError.name: fileNotFound(_:)
Enums/FileError.html#/s:5Medea9FileError.abstract: Unable to find a file wiht the given name.

Enums/FileError.html#/s:5Medea9FileError.name: cannotRead(_:)
Enums/FileError.html#/s:5Medea9FileError.abstract: Unable to open or read the given file.

Enums/StringError.html#/s:5Medea11String.name: encoding
Enums/StringError.html#/s:5Medea11String.abstract: Thrown when JSON decodes into a string that is not UTF-8. This should be impossible.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:5Medea9JSONError.name: unexpectedType
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:5Medea9JSONError.abstract: Thrown when expecting to convert to or from a given JSON type (Object, Array, String, etc) but a different type is encountered instead.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:5Medea9JSONError.name: malformed
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:5Medea9JSONError.abstract: Thrown when a string representation cannot be parsed as JSON.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:5Medea9JSONError.name: invalidType
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:5Medea9JSONError.abstract: Thrown when a JSONArray or JSONObject contains types that are illegal in JSON.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonObject(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Decodes Data representation of a JSON object into a JSONObject.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonArray(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Decodes Data representation of a JSON array into a JSONArray.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonString(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonNumber(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonBool(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonIsNull(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: anyJSON(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonObject(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Parses String representation of a JSON object into a JSONObject.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonArray(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Parses String representation of a JSON array into a JSONArray.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonString(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonNumber(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonBool(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonIsNull(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: anyJSON(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonObject(fromFileNamed:extension:bundle:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Decodes contents of UTF-8 file into a JSONObject.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: jsonArray(fromFileNamed:extension:bundle:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Decodes contents of UTF-8 file into a into a JSONArray.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: anyJSON(fromFileNamed:extension:bundle:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Decodes contents of UTF-8 as JSON.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: data(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a JSONObject into Data.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: data(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a ValidJSONObject into Data. Because it takes a ValidJSONObject, it doesn’t throw.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: data(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a JSONArray into Data.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: data(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a ValidJSONArray into Data. Because it takes a ValidJSONArray, it doesn’t throw.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: string(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a JSONObject into a String.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: string(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a ValidJSONObject into a String. Because it takes a ValidJSONObject it doesn’t throw.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: string(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a JSONArray into a String.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: string(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Serializes a ValidJSONArray into a String. Because it takes a ValidJSONArray, it doesn’t throw.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given String is valid JSON text.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given bytes represent well-formed JSON text.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONObject contains only valid JSON types.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONArray contains only valid JSON types.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given String is well-formed JSON text, throwing if it’s not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given bytes represent well-formed JSON text, throwing if they do not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONObject contains only valid JSON types, throwing if it does not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:5Medea10JSONHel.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONArray contains only valid JSON types, throwing if it does not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html.name: JSONHelper
Enums/JSONHelper.html.abstract: JSONHelper is a bag of functions for converting to and from JSON representations. It’s a very thin wrapper around JSONSerialization.

Other%20Typealiases.html.name: Other Type Aliases
Other%20Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
